product_overview: BasicTechShop is a web-based B2C e-commerce platform focused on computing products such as hardware, peripherals, and components. It offers users browsing, filtering, and purchasing capabilities, while providing administrators with tools to manage inventory, users, and orders.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and responsive e-commerce experience specializing in computing products.
Implement robust user authentication and role-based access control for customers, moderators, and admins.
Enable comprehensive product browsing with filtering and sorting options.
Support a full shopping cart and checkout flow integrated with Stripe for payments.
Offer user profile management, including orders, addresses, favorites, and settings.
Deliver an admin panel for managing products, users, orders, payments, and system configurations.
key_features: Public Shop Interface: Homepage with hero banner, categories, featured products, brand section, product catalog with filters (category, brand, price), sorting, product detail pages with image galleries and related products.
Authentication: Email/password registration, login, protected routes based on user roles using NextAuth.js.
Shopping Cart: Add, remove, update quantity features managed using Zustand state management.
Checkout Flow: Multi-step process with shipping form, payment form, order summary, and Stripe integration for secure payments.
User Profile: Manage personal info, order history, address CRUD, favorite products, and account settings.
Admin Panel: Dashboard displaying sales/orders/users statistics, product/user/order/payment management with full CRUD, role assignments, and system settings.
API Endpoints: RESTful endpoints for auth, products, categories, brands, users, orders, addresses, admin data, and payments.
Responsive Design: Mobile-first approach supporting desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with dark/light theme toggle.
Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM for robust data management.
user_flow_summary: Users access homepage and browse product catalog with filter and sort options.
Users can view detailed product pages and add items to the shopping cart.
Authenticated users can manage their profile, addresses, view order history, and favorite products.
Users proceed through a multi-step checkout flow culminating with Stripe payment.
Admins and moderators use the admin panel to manage products, users, orders, and system settings.
User authentication secures access and enforces role-based permissions for protected routes.
validation_criteria: All UI components and pages render correctly across supported devices and themes (dark/light).
User authentication functions correctly including registration, login, session management, and role-based access control.
Product catalog filtering, sorting, and pagination work as expected.
Shopping cart supports add, remove, update operations with accurate price calculations.
Checkout process securely integrates with Stripe and handles success and cancellation flows.
User profile management CRUD operations for addresses, favorites, and settings operate correctly.
Admin panel allows full CRUD operations on products, users, orders, and payments with role validation.
API endpoints respond correctly with valid requests and handle errors gracefully.
Database schema and relations enforce data integrity and support all required features.
Performance and SEO requirements are met including server-side rendering and loading state skeletons.
